title: IFSTA Essentials 7
description:
The Essentials of Fire Fighting, 7th Edition, Manual meets ALL of the NFPA 1001, 2019 JPRs and is the complete source for firefighter recruit and refresher training. This app includes the basic duties assigned to Fire Fighter I and II firefighters. Included FREE in this app are Skills Videos, Tool Identification, Flashcards, and free access to Chapter 1 of the Exam Prep, Interactive Course and the Audiobook. 

Skills Videos: 

Prepare for the hands-on portion of your class by watching 159 Skills Videos covering Firefighter I, Firefighter II, Hazardous Materials Awareness, and Hazardous Materials Operations. Each Skills Video contains the steps required to pass the skills. This feature allows you to bookmark and download specific skills videos and view the steps for each skill. This feature is FREE for all users. 

Tool Identification: 

Test your tool Identification knowledge with this feature, which includes more than 70 photo identification questions. This feature is FREE for all users. 

Flashcards: 

Review all 765 key terms and definitions found in all 27 chapters of the Essentials of Fire Fighting, 7th Edition, Manual with flashcards. This feature is FREE for all users. 

Exam Prep: 

Use the 1,480 IFSTAⓇ-validated Exam Prep questions to confirm your understanding of the content in the Essentials of Fire Fighting, 7th Edition, Manual. The Exam Prep covers all 27 chapters of the Manual. Exam Prep tracks and records your progress, allowing you to review your exams and study your weaknesses. In addition, your missed questions are automatically added to your study deck. This feature requires an in-app purchase. All users have free access to Chapter 1.  

Interactive Course: 

Reinforce the content in the Essentials of Fire Fighting, 7th Edition, Manual by completing all 27 course chapters. This requires an in-app purchase. This course features self-paced, interactive content to help with supplemental study of the Manual's learning objectives. All users have free access to Chapter 1. 

Audiobook: 

Purchase the Essentials of Fire Fighting, 7th Edition, Audiobook through the app. All 27 chapters are narrated in their entirety for 34 hours of content. Features include offline access, bookmarks, and the ability to listen at your own speed. All users have free access to Chapter 1. 

This App covers the following topics: 

1. Introduction to the Fire Service and Firefighter Safety 
2. Communications 
3. Building Construction 
4. Fire Dynamics 
5. Firefighter Personal Protective Equipment 
6. Portable Fire Extinguishers 
7. Ropes and Knots 
8. Ground Ladders 
9. Forcible Entry 
10. Structural Search and Rescue 
11. Tactical Ventilation 
12. Fire Hose 
13. Hose Operations and Hose Streams 
14. Fire Suppression 
15. Overhaul, Property Conservation, and Scene Preservation 
16. Building Materials, Structural Collapse, ad Effects of Fire Suppression
17. Technical Rescue Support and Vehicle Extrication Operations 
18. Foam Fire Fighting, Liquid Fires, and Gas Fires 
19. Incident Scene Operations 
20. Fire Origin and Cause Determination 
21. Maintenance and Testing Responsibilities 
22. Community Risk Reduction 
23. First Aid Provider 
24. Analyzing the Incident 
25. Action Options and Response Objectives 
26. Personal Protective Equipment, Product Control, and Decontamination 
27. National Incident Management System - Incident Command Structure
